name: sbceq1d
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), wsbc(s0, c1, w1)))

comment: Equality theorem for class substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.) (Revised by NM, 30-Jun-2018.)
